SEC. 4 of the Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 is revised to include consulting and advising as lobbying activities. The threshold for exemption from lobbying registration is reduced to less than 10 percent of the time. These amendments apply to lobbying contacts made after the enactment of this Act. SEC. 5 amends the Federal Election Campaign Act to prohibit foreign nationals from soliciting campaign contributions. The amendments apply to solicitations made after the enactment of this Act.
